pages.title: Kamen Rider Shin
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Shin Kamen Rider: Prologue (1992, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:shin/devices/grasshopper_dna)Grasshopper DNA$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch II$(li)Haste$(li)Jump Boost II$(li)Strength V (with empty hand)$(li)Strength II (with weapon)
